globe_section.title: Serving Businesses in 14+ Countries
globe_section.subtitle: EliteCode Studio operates across multiple regions, delivering lightning-fast web solutions and SEO services to businesses worldwide. With servers optimized for speed and security, we ensure your site performs everywhere.

services_section.title: Comprehensive Services for Your Digital Success
services_section.subtitle: We offer AI-powered solutions that accelerate your business growth.
services_section.ai_seo_description: AI-powered SEO strategies optimized for Google. Outperform competitors, attract real customers.
services_section.value_proposition_ai_seo: Guaranteed more organic traffic and conversions.
services_section.web_dev_description: Modern, ultra-fast, aesthetic, and sales-oriented interfaces. Designs that convert customer clicks into real revenue.

services_section.mobile_dev_description: Performance-oriented applications for iOS & Android. Not just looks, but full functionality.

services_section.automation_description: Bots, automated email flows, AI content generation, customer flow automations. Less manual work, more scalability.
services_section.value_proposition_automation: Smart automations that reduce your workload and increase efficiency.
services_section.fast_delivery_description: Don't let your business processes take weeks. Fast, result-oriented delivery.
services_section.value_proposition_fast_delivery: Enter the market quickly, get ahead of your competitors.

why_us_section.subtitle: We don't just develop projects ‚Äî we grow your brand.
why_us_section.reason1_description: Our main goal in every project is to create measurable and sustainable conversions for your brand.
why_us_section.reason2_description: With our user-experience-focused designs, we ensure your customers spend more time on your site.
why_us_section.reason3_description: All our projects are optimized for the best Google rankings and ultra-fast performance.

pricing_section.subtitle: Transparent and result-oriented digital solution packages, suitable for every budget and need.
pricing_section.plan1_description: Fast growth kit for new brands.
pricing_section.plan2_description: Tailored for businesses seeking aggressive, conversion-focused growth.
pricing_section.plan2_feature2: AI SEO + Google SEO advanced optimization

pricing_section.plan3_feature1: Full corporate website + custom dashboard pages
pricing_section.faq1_answer: Yes, we offer a free initial consultation for every package. You can contact us to discuss your project details and determine the most suitable solution for you.
pricing_section.faq2_answer: Our projects are generally one-time services and are completed within the specified delivery time. Flexible monthly subscriptions are available for maintenance and support services.
pricing_section.faq3_answer: We offer bank transfer/EFT and credit card payment options. For larger projects, we can provide flexible payment plans.
pricing_section.faq4_answer: In case of cancellation after project commencement, billing will be based on the amount of work completed. Please refer to our contract for detailed information.

proof_of_capability_section.subtitle: The reason we deliver the same quality on every project is simple: we have a repeatable, tested, and scalable development process.
proof_of_capability_section.pillar1_description: Search engine compatibility starts from the foundation. Every project is designed with SEO in mind.
proof_of_capability_section.pillar2_description: We set performance targets, measure them, and optimize ruthlessly. Performance metrics align with business goals.
proof_of_capability_section.pillar3_description: Software architecture prioritizes design, maintainability, and scalability. No technical debt.
proof_of_capability_section.pillar4_description: Every project has defined success metrics that are tracked and reported. Data, not assumptions.
proof_of_capability_section.pillar5_description: Live deployment is handled with proper testing and monitoring. Your business is never at risk.

how_we_reduce_risk_section.subtitle: Digital project failures aren't technical‚Äîthey're strategic. We eliminate those mistakes at the process level.
how_we_reduce_risk_section.risk1_description: We define scope clearly at the start. What's included, what's not.
how_we_reduce_risk_section.risk2_description: Success is measured by data, not assumption. Monthly reporting keeps everything transparent.
how_we_reduce_risk_section.risk3_description: SEO isn't tacked on at the end. It's integrated into the architecture from day one.
how_we_reduce_risk_section.risk4_description: Even if your team changes, the system survives. Documentation and standards ensure continuity.

engagement_models_section.subtitle: There's selectivity and prestige in choosing who to work with. We focus only on projects where we can truly create value.
engagement_models_section.model1_description: Website, mobile app, SaaS platform. Full project management from start to finish.
engagement_models_section.model2_description: As your system grows, we grow with it. Architectural improvements, feature additions, and ongoing support.
engagement_models_section.model3_description: Start with MVP, scale gradually. Results delivered in phases.
engagement_models_section.model4_description: Old or poorly designed system? We rebuild it, clean up technical debt.
engagement_models_section.disclaimer: Whichever you choose, the result is the same: scalable, maintainable, revenue-generating systems.

case_patterns_section.subtitle: No names. Just data. Just process.
case_patterns_section.case1_problem: Problem: Organic traffic present, but conversion rate stuck at 0.8%
case_patterns_section.case1_step1: Funnel analysis: 95% of visitors leave within 5 seconds
case_patterns_section.case1_step3: Form and CTA positions optimized via A/B testing
case_patterns_section.case1_step4: Target messaging refined for better resonance
case_patterns_section.case1_result2: Same traffic, more than double the revenue
case_patterns_section.case2_problem: Problem: SaaS platform built quickly but can't scale beyond 10k users. Database queries take 30 seconds.
case_patterns_section.case3_problem: Problem: E-commerce site with 500 SKUs but none ranking on Google

who_is_not_for_section.title: This Service Is NOT For:
who_is_not_for_section.subtitle: To be frank: working with some clients is mutual waste of time.
who_is_not_for_section.not_for1_detail: If procurement efficiency matters more than quality, we compromise nothing.
who_is_not_for_section.not_for2_detail: No 10x growth in 6 months. But 3x growth in 12-18 months? Close to guaranteed.
who_is_not_for_section.not_for3: Those who see digital infrastructure as a cost center
who_is_not_for_section.not_for3_detail: Is your website a cost or a revenue source? If the former, we might not fit.
who_is_not_for_section.closing: If you see your digital system as a long-term asset, you're in the right place.
